${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Opportunist.NAME: Opportunist
${modID}:Opportunist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block instead.

${modID}:Confound.NAME: Confound
${modID}:Confound.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Weak. NL Apply !M! Weak.
${modID}:Confound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Double the enemy's Weak.

${modID}:BodyPurge.NAME: Body Purge
${modID}:BodyPurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove all Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable.

${modID}:ShadowTrail.NAME: Shadow Trail
${modID}:ShadowTrail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:KinStrike.NAME: Kin Strike
${modID}:KinStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies related to this enemy.

${modID}:Morph.NAME: Morph
${modID}:Morph.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain half as much Block. NL Repeat.

${modID}:Transfusion.NAME: Transfusion
${modID}:Transfusion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Transfer all Weak to the enemy.
${modID}:Transfusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Transfer all Weak and Vulnerable to the enemy.

${modID}:ActNatural.NAME: Act Natural
${modID}:ActNatural.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each Basic or Common card drawn.

${modID}:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
${modID}:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Weak, deal !${modID}:weakDamage! damage instead.

${modID}:Pseudopods.NAME: Pseudopods
${modID}:Pseudopods.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Add 2 *Slimed into your discard pile.

${modID}:PsychOut.NAME: Psych Out
${modID}:PsychOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
${modID}:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Enemy gains 4 temporary Strength.
${modID}:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Enemy gains 4 temporary Strength.

${modID}:BroodParasite.NAME: Brood Parasite
${modID}:BroodParasite.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:selfVulnAmt! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Tangle.NAME: Tangle
${modID}:Tangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Leech to ALL enemies.

${modID}:OrganTheft.NAME: Organ Theft
${modID}:OrganTheft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards.

${modID}:FleshToBone.NAME: Flesh to Bone
${modID}:FleshToBone.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Teeth and a *Ribs into your hand.
${modID}:FleshToBone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Teeth+ and a *Ribs+ into your hand.

${modID}:Dredge.NAME: Dredge
${modID}:Dredge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play the lowest-cost card in your hand.

${modID}:TapetumLucidum.NAME: Tapetum Lucidum
${modID}:TapetumLucidum.DESCRIPTION: Add an *Eye into your hand. NL Shuffle an *Eye into your draw pile.
${modID}:TapetumLucidum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an *Eye+ into your hand. NL Shuffle an *Eye+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:PickOff.NAME: Pick Off
${modID}:PickOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the least remaining HP.

${modID}:GuardUp.NAME: Guard Up
${modID}:GuardUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have Frail, gain !${modID}:frailBlock! Block instead.

${modID}:Shifter.NAME: Shifter
${modID}:Shifter.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if any enemy intends to attack, gain !M! temporary Dexterity, otherwise gain !M! temporary Strength.

${modID}:RaiseHackles.NAME: Raise Hackles
${modID}:RaiseHackles.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if ALL enemies intend to attack, NL gain [E].
${modID}:RaiseHackles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if any enemy intends to attack, NL gain [E].

${modID}:Refresh.NAME: Refresh
${modID}:Refresh.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.
${modID}:Refresh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] [E]. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:ShudderingBody.NAME: Shuddering Body
${modID}:ShudderingBody.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block X times.

${modID}:LongCon.NAME: Long Con
${modID}:LongCon.DESCRIPTION: Next time the enemy does not intend to attack, it loses !M! HP.

${modID}:Engulf.NAME: Engulf
${modID}:Engulf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Entropy.NAME: Entropy
${modID}:Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Turn a card in your hand into a copy of this card.

${modID}:MaskOff.NAME: Mask Off
${modID}:MaskOff.DESCRIPTION: If you are below half HP, remove all of your debuffs and gain 1 Strength for each. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MaskOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your debuffs and gain 1 Strength for each. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Uproot.NAME: Uproot
${modID}:Uproot.DESCRIPTION: Activate ${modID}:Leech on the enemy !M! times. NL Remove all ${modID}:Leech from the enemy.

${modID}:ElaborateDeception.NAME: Elaborate Deception
${modID}:ElaborateDeception.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards. NL If you draw 3 Skills, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
${modID}:ElaborateDeception.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards. NL If you draw at least 2 Skills, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
${modID}:MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card in your hand and Retain it for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Cordyceps.NAME: Cordyceps
${modID}:Cordyceps.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack and has ${modID}:Leech, ${modID}:Stun it. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Cordyceps.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack and has ${modID}:Leech, ${modID}:Stun it and apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
${modID}:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: If you have unused Block at the start of your turn, draw !M! cards.
${modID}:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you have unused Block at the start of your turn, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Overgrowth.NAME: Overgrowth
${modID}:Overgrowth.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Leech. NL Increase this card's ${modID}:Leech by !${modID}:boost! this combat. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${modID}:LethalEnvy.NAME: Lethal Envy
${modID}:LethalEnvy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has more HP remaining than you, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:BrandNewMe.NAME: Brand New Me
${modID}:BrandNewMe.DESCRIPTION: Add an *Eye, *Teeth, *Ribs, and *Heart into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BrandNewMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an *Eye, *Teeth, *Ribs, and *Heart into your hand.

${modID}:Autotomize.NAME: Autotomize
${modID}:Autotomize.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ${modID}:Body_Part, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Provoke.NAME: Provoke
${modID}:Provoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Enrage the enemy.

${modID}:SelfAmputate.NAME: Self-Amputate
${modID}:SelfAmputate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. NL Discard 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:BloodPounding.NAME: Blood Pounding
${modID}:BloodPounding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Heart into your hand.
${modID}:BloodPounding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Heart+ into your hand.

${modID}:ShedFangs.NAME: Shed Fangs
${modID}:ShedFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Teeth on top of your draw pile.
${modID}:ShedFangs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Teeth+ on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:FogOfSpores.NAME: Fog of Spores
${modID}:FogOfSpores.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Leech to a random enemy.
${modID}:FogOfSpores.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Leech to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PlayPossum.NAME: Play Possum
${modID}:PlayPossum.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain Block equal to your missing HP.

${modID}:Outreach.NAME: Outreach
${modID}:Outreach.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Red, Green, Blue, and Purple card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:OwnMedicine.NAME: Own Medicine
${modID}:OwnMedicine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Leech. NL If the enemy intends to inflict a debuff, apply twice as much.

${modID}:RottenStench.NAME: Rotten Stench
${modID}:RottenStench.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Enemy regains 1 Strength at the end of its turn for the next !${modID}:strengthUpAmt! turns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MirrorShard.NAME: Mirror Shard
${modID}:MirrorShard.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Block, steal it. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:MyceliumNetwork.NAME: Mycelium Network
${modID}:MyceliumNetwork.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Leech as evenly as possible among ALL enemies.

${modID}:Inspiration.NAME: Inspiration
${modID}:Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever the enemy gains Strength, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Rebirth.NAME: Rebirth
${modID}:Rebirth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:selfVulnAmt! Vulnerable. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:InvasiveTendrils.NAME: Invasive Tendrils
${modID}:InvasiveTendrils.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Activate ${modID}:Leech on ALL enemies.

${modID}:SoulSap.NAME: Soul Sap
${modID}:SoulSap.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Steal half the enemy's Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SoulSap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal half the enemy's Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Compost.NAME: Compost
${modID}:Compost.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your discard pile. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.

${modID}:GrimVisions.NAME: Grim Visions
${modID}:GrimVisions.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase ALL enemy debuffs by !M!.

${modID}:Mockingbird.NAME: Mockingbird
${modID}:Mockingbird.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, copy its attack.

${modID}:MyriadForms.NAME: Myriad Forms
${modID}:MyriadForms.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play 2 cards, draw a card.
${modID}:MyriadForms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 2 cards, draw a card.

${modID}:PorcelainSmile.NAME: Porcelain Smile
${modID}:PorcelainSmile.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal double damage. NL Lost upon taking unblocked damage.

${modID}:ThousandPupils.NAME: Thousand Pupils
${modID}:ThousandPupils.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. NL Add !M! *Eyes into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CorpseCannon.NAME: Corpse Cannon
${modID}:CorpseCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of ${modID}:Body_Parts played this combat.

${modID}:Graft.NAME: Graft
${modID}:Graft.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is created, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Reform.NAME: Reform
${modID}:Reform.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 20 cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Reform.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 20 Upgraded cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TakeWithoutAsking.NAME: Take Without Asking
${modID}:TakeWithoutAsking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain a Relic after combat and permanently transform this card.
${modID}:TakeWithoutAsking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain 2 Relics after combat and permanently transform this card.

${modID}:AnotherBody.NAME: Another Body
${modID}:AnotherBody.DESCRIPTION: Pick a card in your hand and permanently transform it. NL Permanently transform this card.
${modID}:AnotherBody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Pick a card in your hand and permanently transform it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Frankenstein.NAME: Frankenstein
${modID}:Frankenstein.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random ${modID}:Body_Part into your hand.
${modID}:Frankenstein.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random ${modID}:Body_Parts into your hand.

${modID}:Eye.NAME: Eye
${modID}:Eye.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
